messages: I need to develop RIOT code on an ESP32 that uses Non-Volatile Storage (NVS) to store a device state (”1” or “0”) persistently. This process repeats every second, ensuring the temperature is continuously updated in storage.

Now, try again. Check the error information: ["/root/RIOT/examples/LLM_Gen/main.c:21:5: error: function declaration isn't a prototype [-Werror=strict-prototypes]", '/root/RIOT/examples/LLM_Gen/main.c:21:5: error: old-style function definition [-Werror=old-style-definition]', "/root/RIOT/examples/LLM_Gen/main.c:49:9: error: implicit declaration of function 'vTaskDelay' [-Werror=implicit-function-declaration]", "/root/RIOT/examples/LLM_Gen/main.c:49:27: error: 'portTICK_PERIOD_MS' undeclared (first use in this function)"] and Invoke the code tool to solve the error and structure the output with a prefix and code block.

Your answer cannot contain the provided headers and apis from blacklist!): ['nvs_set_u8', 'esp_err_to_name', 'nvs_commit', 'nvs_close', 'xtimer_sleep', 'nvs.h', 'nvs_flash.h', 'nvs_set_blob', 'nvs_get_blob', 'vTaskDelay']

Your answer must contain all the ['mbox.h', 'xtimer.h', 'evtimer_msg.h', 'msg.h', 'timex.h', 'stddef.h', 'unistd.h', 'stdio.h', 'stdatomic.h', 'nvs.h', 'time_units.h', 'stdlib.h', 'string.h', 'evtimer_mbox.h', 'ztimer.h', 'nvs_flash.h']!
